answers.answer: at did u eat or drink prior to getting your test? Not including the drink they have u drink

dont worry too much worst case scenario yes it could cause still birth a huge baby or a very small baby. However if u just watch ur carb intake and eat smaller portions of meals and things like bread milk, juice fruit etc ur sugars should be controlled and there shouldnt be any problem with baby
No I didn't drink or eat anything except for what they had me drink. She said my babys heartbreat and measurements were perfect, but I'm still just really nervous.
did you do the 1 hour or the 3 hour one??
I did the one hour, but tomorrow their having me do the three hour.
well maybe it just takes the baby a little longer to digest it or something, i was told to eat healthy 24hrs b4 my test so it would be accurate so not alot of salt and sugar
Same thing happened to me. I went and took the second test and passed with flying colors. It's common to fail the first one! Don't worry :)
Sigh, thanks. Makes me not so nervous lol.

question: I went in for my weekly checkup and my doctor read me my blood results for the sugar/diabetes test and said I failed horribly. It was supposed to be 135 but I was at 176 :( she says it could be diabetes but they want to do another blood test tomorrow just to make sure. I'm really nervous because she says it can cause still birth or a 9-10 pound baby with labor problems. I'm really scared I'm gunna fail again. Has any of this happened with you mommys? I'm a ftm and 31 weeks pregnant. And very nervous.
title: So scared and nervous. I need advice. :(
